definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
each word carries weight/a promise must be kept (idiom)

sentences.english: Earthworms play a vital role in food production.
sentences.chinese: 在粮食生产方面，蚯蚓扮演极为重要的作用。

sentences.english: An investor-friendly package is paramount to funding.
sentences.chinese: 对投资者有利的方案是极为重要的资金。

sentences.english: In China, respect for your elders, for your forbears , is even more important than making money.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，尊敬老人和列祖列宗要比赚钱更为重要。

sentences.english: The Shuanglong Lake is a shallow and urban lake, it had been a serious typical eutrophic lake.
sentences.chinese: 双龙湖是浅水型城市湖泊，一度为重富营养化湖泊。

sentences.english: Intuition and experience are of far greater value in applying frequency tables.
sentences.chinese: 在寻找密码表时，直觉和经验更为重要。

sentences.english: B: Right. It seems to be quite important to Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 对，对中国文化来说，这一点显得尤为重要。

sentences.english: A second limitation is more consequential.
Most architects agree that this is essential to the success of the project.
sentences.chinese: 大部分架构师都认为这对项目的成功极为重要。

sentences.english: It is important to check with a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 经医生检查这一关尤为重要。

sentences.english: Lateral groups of nephrons are affected more than central ones, leading to patchy atrophy with variable degrees of severity.
sentences.chinese: 受累较中央组为重，而导致严重程度不等的斑状萎缩。

sentences.english: Early accurate diagnosis and prompt treatment are needed.
sentences.chinese: 本病的的早期正确诊断颇为重要。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 discusses the numerical models of heavy gas dispersion.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为重气扩散过程的数值模拟模型。

sentences.english: Confidentiality may be particularly stringentin this case.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，保密性显得尤为重要。

sentences.english: But another no-show was perhaps more important.
sentences.chinese: 但是，另一个失约者也许更为重要。

sentences.english: Investigate and research work has an important signification for the economy crime detection.
sentences.chinese: 调研对于经侦工作显得尤为重要。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the formal verification of MANET non-secure and secure routing protocols.
sentences.chinese: 在安全问题中，路由协议的正确性尤为重要。

definition: to give thought (to others)/to consider (other people's needs)/also pr. [zhao2 xiang3]
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all
to consider oneself as/to believe oneself to be
to take into consideration/to attend to
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
